4320.title: Rusty Rivets
4320.description: When the Bits find a satellite crashed in the scrapyard, Rusty has to find a way to get the satellite bit back home to space! // Rusty and the gang must move a sick fish to the Nature Park for treatment.

4321.title: Rusty Rivets
4321.description: When Mr. Higgins accidentally fills a GIANT beach ball with water instead of air, it's up to the gang to get it to the lake without popping so it doesn't flood the town. // Rusty and Ruby get stranded on an island when they compete to see who can pick up the most garbage at the lake.

10418.title: Rusty Rivets
10418.description: Liam wants to visit an amusement park, but obstacles in the way delay them from getting there in time, so Rusty makes a theme park just for him. // Rusty builds a big vacuum to clean up Liam's mess and find his screwdriver but the megavac starts to suck up too much!

10419.title: Rusty Rivets
10419.description: Rusty and Ruby turn Sammy Scoops into Captain Scoops, an ice cream superhero, in order to sell the most ice cream. // The kids find the courage to search for a mysterious mythical creature.

16971.title: Rusty Rivets
16971.description: Rusty builds rocket skates instead of learning how to skate but these cut up the ice and end up stranding all his friends on ice floes. // When Ralph (Liam's toy) goes missing in the woods, Rusty and Ruby join the hunt. Alas, they all get lost, and have to find a way home without Rusty's usual tools to help them!

16972.title: Rusty Rivets
16972.description: Rusty and Ruby make Ranger Anna a robotic pet, but it goes haywire when they try to program it. // Rusty builds Liam a spaceship as a surprise, but instead of impressing him, it wreaks havoc on the town.

23541.title: Rusty Rivets
23541.description: On a busy day, Officer Carl needs to be in too many places at the same time, so they 'deputize' the Bits to help him out // Rusty, Ruby, and Anna discover that a local beaver hasn't been able to repair its dam due to a sore tooth.

23542.title: Rusty Rivets
23542.description: When Rusty, Ruby and Liam build a fort that Botasaur can't fit into, he runs away to make his own fort. // Rusty and Ruby help Mr. Higgins fix his broken bulldozer, only to have it cause mayhem all over town.

29974.title: Rusty Rivets
29974.description: The comic book action figures Rusty created for Liam come alive and behave just like their conquering characters. // Sammy and Rusty must get back to town before the yummy flower they picked for Sammy's sorbet turns yucky.

29975.title: Rusty Rivets
29975.description: While helping Chef Betty and Sammy compete for the Peachy Keen tasting contest, Rusty and Ruby must find a way to get them working together. // Ruby tries to help the monkeys at the Animal Park come up with some new performances.

36702.title: Rusty Rivets
36702.description: When Botasaur gets tired from playing, Rusty builds him a bigger battery - but with it comes a LOT more energy! // Ruby demonstrates her newest invention - the world's strongest glue - and gets all of Sparkton Hills stuck

36703.title: Rusty Rivets
36703.description: Officer Carl loses his lucky sculpture. Rusty and Ruby must find it and convince Officer Carl he's a great police officer with or without the sculpture. // Rusty and Ruby help Liam when he thinks he's only good at video games, not real life games.

43374.title: Rusty Rivets
43374.description: Super stinky weeds invade town but Botasaur thinks they're delicious! // Rusty turns Botasaur into the ultimate beach day gadget, but Rusty can't get to the beach to play with him because they keep stopping to help friends in need.

43375.title: Rusty Rivets
43375.description: Mr. Higgins wants to go to the town dance, but thinks he's a terrible dancer. So Rusty and Ruby build a suit that dances for him. // Rusty accidentally causes bees to abandon their hive in the Recycling Yard and must lure them back home.

49584.title: Rusty Rivets
49584.description: Rusty builds a robot version of himself, so he can do two things at once. // Rusty and Ruby build a robotic buddy for Botasaur, a Kittybot!

49585.title: Rusty Rivets
49585.description: Ruby wants to see a comet fly by, and Rusty will do everything in his power to make sure his friend's wish comes true! // Rusty and Ruby race to fix a leaking underwater oil pipeline before it pollutes the lake and makes it uninhabitable.

55830.title: Rusty Rivets
55830.description: When Ranger Anna crash lands her planes in the distant savannah, Rusty and Ruby realize they need a new vehicle that can not only travel the distance, but aid them in their builds. Thus, the Mobile Rivet Lab is born!

55831.title: Rusty Rivets
55831.description: When Ranger Anna gets stuck in a tree while observing monkeys, Rusty and Ruby make a monkey of their own to save her... Botarilla! // Ranger Anna and Liam get trapped in the ranger station by a giant snowball!

62488.title: Rusty Rivets
62488.description: Rusty forgets the code to his robotic piggy bank, activating its self-defense mode and turning it into a runaway robotic boar. // Rusty and Ruby must save a baby whale that's been beached during a storm and reunite it with her family.

62489.title: Rusty Rivets
62489.description: New neighbor Frankie Fritz bot-naps Botasaur, making Rusty and Ruby go on a chase to get their friend back. // Rusty builds a machine that makes and stacks sand blocks, to help Liam build a giant sand castle.

69038.title: Rusty Rivets
69038.description: Frankie Fritz challenges Rusty and Ruby to a race around Sparkton Hills, with the Mobile Rivet Lab as the stakes. // Rusty and Ruby try to save the school's art fair from being frozen over by Frankie Fritz and his Skunk-bot, Frankford.

69039.title: Rusty Rivets
69039.description: Rusty and Ruby set off on their pirate ship in a hunt for a buried treasure. // When Frankie's robo-mouse accidentally gets copied dozens of times, it's up to Rusty and Ruby to round up the little critters before they take over Sparkton Hills.

75415.title: Rusty Rivets
75415.description: Rusty builds his Mom the ultimate relaxing chair, but whenever it hears any noise, it runs away and raises high into the sky! // Rusty, and Ruby try to save the Wake Up and Smell the Roses Contest from Frankie Fritz' stinky Robotic Skunk.

75416.title: Rusty Rivets
75416.description: When Liam gets trapped atop a tall stack of junk with his stuffed dinosaur, Rusty designs a Jurassic rescue. // When Mr. Higgins' remote control plane won't land, Rusty and the gang must bring it down safely - using Crush as a daredevil rescue pilot hero!

81932.title: Rusty Rivets
81932.description: Rusty and the gang's ski trip is thwarted by a massive rockpile on the way to Pliers Peak. // Rusty and Ruby earn their camping badges by rescuing a trapped opossum.

81933.title: Rusty Rivets
81933.description: Rusty and the gang must get some penguins to the Nature Park on the hottest day of the year. // Liam enters a sand-castle building contest and loses his elaborate plans to a thieving seagull, Rusty and Ruby must get them back before the contest deadline.

88306.title: Rusty Rivets
88306.description: With help from Rusty and the Bits, Ruby performs at the Sprocketville Talent Show. // When Liam accidentally launches a giant helium balloon with him in the basket beneath - Rusty and Ruby must find a way to bring him down gently before a storm hits.

88307.title: Rusty Rivets
88307.description: When Ruby's tablet winds up at the bottom of the lake, Rusty dives in to save the day. // The circus is coming - but when the engine fails on the circus train, Rusty must figure out how to get it back on track in time for opening night.

94182.title: Rusty Rivets
94182.description: When Rusty finds an old pirate's map, he and the gang dig up a lot more than treasure. // When the Bits wander into Rusty's parts replicator, the gang winds up with more bits than they bargained for.

94183.title: Rusty Rivets
94183.description: When the key to the city goes missing, everyone assumes Botasaur buried it. But it isn't long until they dig up the truth. // When Sammy gets trapped in a cave while spelunking, Rusty saves the day with a big idea inspired by a small creature.
